title: Litmus Green - Circle That A! (1995) [FLAC]
description:
Artist: Litmus Green
Album: Circle That A!
Originally Released: 1995

01. For-Too [2:15]
02. Goin' to Town [2:12]
03. Robotek [3:37]
04. Data [1:24]
05. Cockroach [1:44]
06. 2.7 Kids [1:50]
07. Couch Falafel [2:00]
08. Stock Exchange [2:32]
09. Go-Stop [2:14]
10. How Many Times? (Rich-Poor-Class War) [1:55]
11. My Life, My Choice [1:34]
12. Waiting for You [0:40]
13. Bakersfield Slaughter [1:31]
14. Tree-Frog [2:48]
15. Test Anxiety [1:41]
16. Wage Slave [2:33]
17. Mercedes-Benz [1:43]
18. Genital Wart [2:23]
19. Nuke Me Slowly [2:18]
20. I Hate The Lord [2:29]
21. O.C. Scene [4:08]

Circle That A! is the first full-length release from Southern California (mostly Orange County) hardcore punk band, Litmus Green, following a few 7" vinyl recordings, demos, and a cassette.

Twenty-one raw, in-your-face, real punk-rock ditties in just over forty-five minutes!
"2.7 Kids" and "Mercedes-Benz" are especially recommended. No sound assaults your eardrums quite like the rapid-fire staccato of Rev. Sean's shout-singing, in full display on these two killer tracks.
"Waiting for You" is a cover of a song by Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada hardcore-punk band, D.O.A., from their 1981 album, Hardcore '81.

This album is currently out-of-print.
Litmus Green has posted Circle That A!, and the rest of their catalog, online; free for listening/downloading (128kbps). <a href="
http://songs.litmusgreen.com/CircleThatA/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://songs.litmusgreen.com/CircleThatA/</a>
